Enables /skyspawn command for generating new spawn platforms
carpetskyadditions.rule.generateEndPorta: Generates End Portal frames in a SkyBlock world
carpetskyadditions.rule.generateSilverfi: Generates Silverfish spawners in a SkyBlock world
carpetskyadditions.rule.generateAncientC: Generates Ancient City portal frames in a SkyBlock world
carpetskyadditions.rule.generateMagmaCub: Generates Magma Cube spawners in a SkyBlock world
carpetskyadditions.rule.generateRandomEn: Generates random End Gateways in the Outer End Islands in a SkyBlock world
carpetskyadditions.rule.tallFlowersFromW: Allows the Wandering Trader to sell tall flowers
carpetskyadditions.rule.lavaFromWanderin: Allows the Wandering Trader to sell Lava
carpetskyadditions.rule.lightningElectri: Makes Lightning convert Vines attached to Glowstone into Glow Lichen when it strikes the Glowstone
The Lightning can also strike a Lightning Rod on the Glowstone.
carpetskyadditions.rule.renewableBudding: Makes Lava convert into a Budding Amethyst when surrounded by Calcite and Smooth Basalt
carpetskyadditions.rule.gatewaysSpawnCho: Makes Chorus generate on Endstone Islands generated by End Gateways
carpetskyadditions.rule.renewableHeartsO: Allows Dolphins to dig up Hearts of the Sea when given a Fish
carpetskyadditions.rule.renewableDragonH: Makes Ender Dragons drop their heads when killed by a Charged Creepers
carpetskyadditions.rule.shulkerSpawnsOnD: Makes a Shulker spawn on the Bedrock Pillar when the End Dragon is re-killed
carpetskyadditions.rule.renewableDiamond: Allows Falling Anvils to compact stacks of Coal Blocks into a Diamonds
carpetskyadditions.rule.rammingWart.desc: Allows a ramming Goat to break Nether Wart Blocks into Nether Wart
carpetskyadditions.rule.foxesSpawnWithSw: Probability that Foxes spawn with Sweet Berries
carpetskyadditions.rule.poisonousPotatoe: Makes Spiders turn into Cave Spiders when right-clicked with a Poisonous Potato
carpetskyadditions.rule.saplingsDieOnSan: Allows Saplings to be placed on Sand, but they soon turn into Dead Bushes
carpetskyadditions.rule.renewableEchoSha: Makes Creatures with Echolocation (Bats and Dolphins) drop Echo Shards when killed by a Warden's Sonic Boom attack
carpetskyadditions.rule.allayableVexes.d: Allows Vexes to turn into Allays when played the correct Note Block sequence
carpetskyadditions.rule.coralErosion.des: Makes Dead Coral erode into Sand when Water flows out of it
carpetskyadditions.rule.hugeMushroomsSpr: Makes Mushrooms spread Mycelium onto dirt-like blocks nearby when Bonemealed into Huge Mushrooms
carpetskyadditions.rule.renewableNetherr: Makes Netherrack or Nylium generate around Nether Portals that generate midair
What generates depends on the biome, with Nyliums generating in their respective forests and Netherrack elsewhere
carpetskyadditions.rule.renewableDeepsla: Allows Thick Potions to convert Stone into Deepslate, either by right-clicking or using a splash potion
With no_splash: splash potion conversion is disabled.
carpetskyadditions.rule.renewableSwiftSn: Allows Enchanting Tables near Wardens to enchant with Swift Sneak
carpetskyadditions.rule.maxWanderingTrad: This starts at 0.025 and increases by 0.025 each time a trader spawn fails until the max chance is reached.
carpetskyadditions.rule.wanderingTraderS: How often the Wandering Trader attempts to spawn in ticks
